show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: Action on the Global Climate Crisis

title: Action on the Global Climate Crisis
content: A talk with Anna Goldstein, US Campaigns Manager for 350.org, about the dynamic interrelatedness driving climate... <!--more--> change; also, 350.org’s divestment campaign, the Climate Forward demonstration in DC on Presidents Day weekend, and the Global Power Shift event in Istanbul in June; poem by Mary Mackey
